function.name: stock_screener
function.description: Find stocks that meet specific investment criteria. This endpoint allows you to search for stocks based on various criteria, such as market cap, price, volume, beta, sector, and country.

limit.description: The maximum number of stock results to return

marketCapMoreThan.description: Filter for stocks with a market cap greater than this value

marketCapLowerThan.description: Filter for stocks with a market cap less than this value

priceMoreThan.description: Filter for stocks with a price greater than this value

priceLowerThan.description: Filter for stocks with a price less than this value

betaMoreThan.description: Filter for stocks with a beta greater than this value

betaLowerThan.description: Filter for stocks with a beta less than this value

volumeMoreThan.description: Filter for stocks with a volume greater than this value

volumeLowerThan.description: Filter for stocks with a volume less than this value

dividendMoreThan.description: Filter for stocks with a dividend greater than this value

dividendLowerThan.description: Filter for stocks with a dividend less than this value

isEtf.description: Filter to return only ETFs if true

isFund.description: Filter to return only funds if true

isActivelyTrading.description: Filter for stocks that are actively trading if true

sector.description: Filter for stocks in a specific sector

industry.description: Filter for stocks in a specific industry

country.description: Filter for stocks based in a specific country

exchange.description: Filter for stocks listed on a specific exchange
